settings.heading: Gifts with a flourish
settings.description: Orders can be prepared with a festive sleeve. Add gift wrapping to your order at checkout.

settings.heading: A gesture of thanks, for you
settings.description: Receive a complimentary recycled-cotton tote bag with all orders over $120.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.description: We offer refunds for all products returned within 30 days of purchase, in their unopened and original condition.

settings.heading: Complimentary shipping
settings.description: Enjoy easily tracked standard shipping on all orders, free of charge.

settings.heading: Double-Cleasing with Hydrating Facial Cleanser
settings.description:
Start your day with a gentle, Sērene® hydrating cleansers to remove impurities without stripping your skin’s natural moisture barrier. Look for one with soothing ingredients like glycerin or hyaluronic acid.

An effective yet gentle cleanser purifies the skin daily, readying it for toning and hydration, while an exfoliant should be employed twice weekly to deeply cleanse and slough away dead skin cells.

settings.heading: Hydrating Toner or Essence
settings.description: Follow with Sērene® Refreshing Toner Mist. This lightweight toner revitalizes and rebalances your skin with a blend of chamomile and cucumber extracts. It enhances moisture retention, preparing your skin to absorb the next products more effectively.

settings.heading: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
settings.description: Boost hydration with a few drops of Sērene® Deep Hydration Serum, packed with hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5. This serum dives deep into the skin to lock in moisture, leaving your skin plump and glowing while addressing signs of dehydration.

settings.heading: Moisturizer
settings.description: Seal all the hydration with Sērene® Nourishing Gel-Cream, a lightweight yet powerful moisturizer featuring ceramides and squalane. It strengthens the skin’s protective barrier and provides long-lasting hydration, perfect for daily use.

settings.heading: Sunscreen with Hydrating Properties
settings.description: Finish your morning routine with Sērene® Hydrating Sunscreen SPF 50. This broad-spectrum sunscreen not only shields your skin from harmful UV rays but also includes hydrating ingredients like glycerin and vitamin E to keep your skin soft and supple all day.

settings.heading: After the Power of [Our Product]
settings.description: Every formulation is a meticulous blend of nature's artistry and cutting-edge skincare technology, inviting you to embark on a transformative journey.

settings.author: {{ shop.metaobjects.customer_reviews["emily-r"].name.value }}
settings.description: “The body lotion is my go-to after a shower. It absorbs quickly and keeps my skin hydrated all day. Plus, the subtle citrus scent is divine!”

settings.author: Sophia L.
settings.description: "I’ve tried countless shampoos, but Serene’s Hair Care Collection has transformed my hair. It’s softer, shinier, and feels healthier than ever!"

settings.author: Hanie T.
settings.description: “The hand cream is an absolute game-changer. My hands feel deeply moisturized without that greasy residue. I always keep one in my bag!”

settings.author: Oliver R.
settings.description: “The hand cream saved my dry hands during winter. It’s lightweight but so hydrating—I’m obsessed with the lavender scent!”

settings.author: Grace H.
settings.description: “I’ve been using Serene’s conditioner, and it works wonders on my frizzy hair. Even my barber noticed the improvement!”
